text: it's not a wearable. just a smart cup.
we don't have any channels for cups
I feel like I drink totally inadequately after watching the people in this video
Like - Im just not nearly as contemplative as these folks when it comes to my beverages
Can we make a parody smart object video? Kind of like the way <http://www.remadeco.org|www.remadeco.org> is a parody of <http://www.bestmadeco.com|www.bestmadeco.com>
I would enjoy that very much
I think that would be awesome.
the hard part is that - at this point - the line between the actual and the parody is just razor thin
Im not 100% sure vessyl isn't a joke
That's why it would be so good.
It would be the terrible infomercial of the smart tech age.
Im not sure I could come up with something better than a cup that tells you what you just poured into it - thats called Vessyl, that has a metric call Pryme
and that connects to my iphone
like - honestly, where do you go for comedy after that?
